name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Data Science and Machine Learning Engineer
profile_summary:
A results-driven Data Science and Machine Learning Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience specializing in developing machine learning solutions that adhere to healthcare compliance standards. Proficient in **Python**, **scikit-learn**, **TensorFlow**, and **PyTorch**, I bring expertise in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model validation to ensure the delivery of high-quality predictive analytics systems.
I leverage version control systems such as **Git** and have extensive experience in CI/CD automation for streamlined deployment of machine learning models. Additionally, my background in statistical methods and data visualization enhances my ability to derive actionable insights from complex datasets.
In the full stack realm, I am skilled in utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, further enriching my capabilities to develop robust applications integrated with AI/ML functionalities. My experience spans across cloud environments including **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring that solutions are scalable and compliant with regulations such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.
